requirements.description: No sensitive personal information should be used with the service, except as permitted under section 4.5 for protected health information.

The service is not intended to meet legal obligations such as HIPAA requirements, and Sentry is not considered a business associate under HIPAA, except as detailed in a Business Associate Agreement (BAA).

type.summary: Service Not Intended for HIPAA Compliance

requirements.description: Sentry has no liability for sensitive personal information, except for protected health information (PHI) submitted in accordance with section 4.5.

type.summary: Liability Exclusion for Sensitive Personal Information
